body: I would like to say thanks to the members of staff who answer the online player reports. It is a big help so thank you very much :D
body_tagged: I would like to say thanks to the members of staff who answer the online player reports. It is a big help so thank you very much :D
title: Thank you staff <3

replies.body:
Don't thank us, thank yourself. 
All we do it type one simple command and a few actions while you guys put in all the effort for screenshots or videos!
replies.body_tagged:
Don't thank us, thank yourself. 
All we do it type one simple command and a few actions while you guys put in all the effort for screenshots or videos!

replies.body:
Yes, thank you to all the staff :D
Nothing is more rewarding and satisfying than seeing a hacker getting banned because of a report, ingame or online.





That sounds kinda cruel tbh .-.
